company_description: CSF (Consulting and Food Technology Transfer Co., Ltd.) is a company specializing in providing technology solutions, production processes, and product development services for organizations operating in the food industry, such as household businesses, small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), and OCOP entities.
company_info: Founded in 2025, CSF aims to become a strategic partner in food technology consulting and transfer in Vietnam. With a team of experienced experts, CSF provides specialized solutions in production processes, product development, and technology improvement, effectively serving small businesses, SMEs, and OCOP entities in the food industry.
quality_desc: Committed to providing high-applicability technology solutions and consulting services, helping to enhance the quality of customers' food products.
sustainability_desc: Oriented towards appropriate technology transfer, optimizing production processes to bring long-term effectiveness and sustainable development for businesses.
trusted_partner_desc: Always accompanying small businesses, SMEs, and OCOP entities in the journey of enhancing competitiveness and expanding the market.
